subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Adam Vinatieri missed a 29-yard field-goal attempt with 1 minute 31 seconds left, as the Colts comeback fell short on a night that Peyton Manning delivered one of his worst performances.
snippet: Adam Vinatieri missed a 29-yard field-goal attempt with 1 minute 31 seconds left, as the Colts comeback fell short on a night that Peyton Manning delivered one of his worst performances.
